title: InterruptedExceptions while stopping the spider with user authentication

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in the next main release.

body:
Issue reported in OWASP ZAP User Group: https://groups.google.com/d/topic/zaproxy-users/bHXzwhMtwYQ/discussion

---

Steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Start ZAP;
2. Run the spider with authentication enabled;
3. Stop the spider;
4. Check the log file, there should be an exception:

```
[AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO org.zaproxy.zap.spider.Spider  - Stopping spidering process by request.
[AWT-EventQueue-0] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.spider.Spider  - Failed to await for all spider threads to stop in the given time (2s)...
[AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO org.zaproxy.zap.extension.spider.SpiderThread  - Spider scanning complete: false
[pool-4-thread-1] ERROR org.parosproxy.paros.view.OutputPanel  - 
java.lang.InterruptedException
    at java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)
    at java.lang.Object.wait(Object.java:503)
    at java.awt.EventQueue.invokeAndWait(EventQueue.java:1282)
    at java.awt.EventQueue.invokeAndWait(EventQueue.java:1263)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.view.OutputPanel.append(OutputPanel.java:189)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.AuthenticationHelper.notifyOutputAuthFailure(AuthenticationHelper.java:74)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.FormBasedAuthenticationMethodType$FormBasedAuthenticationMethod.authenticate(FormBasedAuthenticationMethodType.java:255)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.users.User.authenticate(User.java:255)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.users.User.processMessageToMatchUser(User.java:171)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpSender.sendAuthenticated(HttpSender.java:466)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpSender.sendAndReceive(HttpSender.java:364)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpSender.sendAndReceive(HttpSender.java:322)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderTask.fetchResource(SpiderTask.java:339)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderTask.run(SpiderTask.java:192)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
```

or

```
[AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO org.zaproxy.zap.spider.Spider  - Stopping spidering process by request.
[AWT-EventQueue-0] WARN org.zaproxy.zap.spider.Spider  - Failed to await for all spider threads to stop in the given time (2s)...
[AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO org.zaproxy.zap.extension.spider.SpiderThread  - Spider scanning complete: false
[pool-2-thread-2] ERROR org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.ExtensionHistory  - 
java.lang.InterruptedException
    at java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)
    at java.lang.Object.wait(Object.java:503)
    at java.awt.EventQueue.invokeAndWait(EventQueue.java:1282)
    at java.awt.EventQueue.invokeAndWait(EventQueue.java:1263)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.ExtensionHistory.addHistoryInEventQueue(ExtensionHistory.java:387)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.ExtensionHistory.addHistory(ExtensionHistory.java:373)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.AuthenticationHelper.addAuthMessageToHistory(AuthenticationHelper.java:93)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.FormBasedAuthenticationMethodType$FormBasedAuthenticationMethod.authenticate(FormBasedAuthenticationMethodType.java:259)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.users.User.authenticate(User.java:255)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.users.User.processMessageToMatchUser(User.java:171)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpSender.sendAuthenticated(HttpSender.java:466)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpSender.sendAndReceive(HttpSender.java:364)
    at org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpSender.sendAndReceive(HttpSender.java:322)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderTask.fetchResource(SpiderTask.java:339)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderTask.run(SpiderTask.java:192)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
```

(Exception stack traces were obtained with ZAP running from source.)

Remarks:
The exceptions might not happen always, it only happens if the spider is stopped immediately before/after an authentication attempt (when adding the status message to Output tab or adding the HTTP message to History tab).

ZAP:
Versions >= 2.4.0
